About Me

BIO

I am a full stack developer. I love to design and develop web applications and mobile applications that improve people's productivity.

Boeing India Pvt Ltd

Full Stack Developer & UX/UI Designer

I am currently working in Boeing. Here I design and develop web based applications for business and supply chain using React, Angular and Spring boot

John Deere India Pvt Ltd

Full stack Developer

I was responsible for the modernization and re-platform the AgLogic, Stellar support & MyJohnDeere platform to AWS.
